briefdescription.para: DP matrices suitable for local structure prediction using window approach.
DP matrices suitable for distance class partitioned structure prediction.
An enumerator that is used to specify the type of a polymorphic Dynamic Programming (DP) matrix data structure.
Typename for the Minimum Free Energy (MFE) DP matrices data structure vrna_mx_mfe_s.
Typename for the Partition Function (PF) DP matrices data structure vrna_mx_pf_s.

detaileddescription.para: This function adds DP matrices of a specific type to the provided vrna_fold_compound_t, such that successive DP recursion can be applied. The function caller has to specify which type of DP matrix is requested, see vrna_mx_type_e, and what kind of recursive algorithm will be applied later on, using the parameters type, and options, respectively. For the latter, Minimum free energy (MFE), and Partition function (PF) computations are distinguished. A third option that may be passed is VRNA_OPTION_HYBRID, indicating that auxiliary DP arrays are required for RNA-RNA interaction prediction.

simplesect.para: Usually, there is no need to call this function, since the constructors of vrna_fold_compound_t are handling all the DP matrix memory allocation.

vrna_mx_mfe_add(), vrna_mx_pf_add(), vrna_fold_compound(), vrna_fold_compound_comparative(), vrna_fold_compound_free(), vrna_mx_pf_free(), vrna_mx_mfe_free(), vrna_mx_type_e, VRNA_OPTION_MFE, VRNA_OPTION_PF, VRNA_OPTION_HYBRID, VRNA_OPTION_EVAL_ONLY

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t that holds pointers to the DP matrices
The type of DP matrices requested
Option flags that specify the kind of DP matrices, such as MFE or PF arrays, and auxiliary requirements

simplesect.para: 1 if DP matrices were properly allocated and attached, 0 otherwise

briefdescription.para: Free memory occupied by the Minimum Free Energy (MFE) Dynamic Programming (DP) matrices.

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t storing the MFE DP matrices that are to be erased from memory

briefdescription.para: Free memory occupied by the Partition Function (PF) Dynamic Programming (DP) matrices.

parameterdescription.para: The vrna_fold_compound_t storing the PF DP matrices that are to be erased from memory

briefdescription.para: Functions to deal with standard dynamic programming (DP) matrices.
